result.reason: DPI scaling bug: Screen.Bounds returns logical pixels in fullscreen, causing understated RDP resolution on non-100% DPI displays
result.approach: In SetResolution() fullscreen path, replace Screen.Bounds * ResolutionScalingFactor with physical pixel dimensions via Win32 EnumDisplaySettings or remove redundant DPI multiplication when per-monitor DPI aware; apply same fix in RdpProtocol8.DoResizeClient()
